jack-o-lanterns.description: This year we made two sets of jack-o-lanterns:  one set in early October that liquefied by mid-month, and another set a few days before Halloween.  You can never have too many jack-o-lanterns.
jack-o-lanterns.title: Jack O Lanterns

milo2.description: Milo has quite a repertoire of smiles.   Coy.  Smirky.  Excited.  This one I guess you'd call blissed-out goofy.
milo2.title: Milo 2

milo3.description: The evening turned cold after a playdate at Phoebe's, so Sarah lent Milo a hat. Doesn't he look sweet?
milo3.title: Milo 3

milo4.description: Milo's taken an interest in rolling over and sitting up.
milo4.title: Milo 4

nate.description: Nate (a.k.a. Batman) threw a pre-Halloween party.  Cosmonaut Felix was captivated by the Star Wars spaceship.  It might be genetic:  Dean had the same spaceship when he was a boy.
nate.title: Nate

potty1.description: Potty training has begun in earnest.
potty1.title: Potty 1

potty2.description:
Felix likes to wear "Buzz Lightyear" big boy trainer pants instead of diapers. When it's time to change diapers, we tell him he can wear Buzz if he pees in the potty first. So he'll trot over to the potty and give it his all.

"Big boy couches", as he calls them, are a powerful incentive. However, once they are on, he just pees and poops in them like regular diapers. Oh well, one step at a time.
potty2.title: Potty 2

potty3.description: Sometimes it takes a while, so Milo comes over to give some encouragement.
potty3.title: Potty 3

trick-or-treat01.description:
Halloween night. Friends from Felix's school gather at our house before trick-or-treating. In this picture:
Blue hair cat woman: Cindee (Kora & Torin's mom)
Baby lion: Milo!
Kitty cat princess: Kora
Chicken: Phoebe
Skeleton: Torin
trick-or-treat01.title: Trick Or Treat 1

trick-or-treat01b.description: Sarah, the heifer, shows off her newest trick -- standing -- while Kitty cat princess admires the chicken's feathers.
trick-or-treat01b.title: Trick Or Treat01b

trick-or-treat02.description: Felix gives Kora's wand a twirl.
trick-or-treat02.title: Trick Or Treat 2

trick-or-treat03.description: Lucie's giraffe costume, amazingly, took her less than an hour to construct.
trick-or-treat03.title: Trick Or Treat 3

trick-or-treat04.description: Space rancher Felix has a firm grip on Sarah's hoof.
trick-or-treat04.title: Trick Or Treat 4

trick-or-treat05.description: Laura, the mom of barnyard friends Phoebe and Sarah.
trick-or-treat05.title: Trick Or Treat 5

trick-or-treat06.description: Space bug Dean has a snack.
trick-or-treat06.title: Trick Or Treat 6

trick-or-treat07.description:
Torin must have heard that song by Tom Waits:
"it ain't no sin,
to take off your skin,
and dance around in your bones"
trick-or-treat07.title: Trick Or Treat 7

trick-or-treat08.description: We had practiced trick-or-treating a bit, so Felix knew exactly what to do.   He marched up to every house, knocked or rang, and said "Trick or treat!".    And he mostly remembered to say "thank you."
trick-or-treat08.title: Trick Or Treat 8

trick-or-treat09.description: A giraffe horns in on the action.
trick-or-treat09.title: Trick Or Treat 9

trick-or-treat10.description:
Baby Elephant was in his own little space suit, inside the plastic pumpkin basket, guarding the candy.

The pirate on the right is Chris, Kora and Torin's dad.
trick-or-treat10.title: Trick Or Treat 10

trick-or-treat11.description: Going up and down all those steps is hard work! Cosmonaut Felix was glad he brought his spaceship along.
trick-or-treat11.title: Trick Or Treat 11

trick-or-treat12.description: This house even had a "John Kerry 4 Prez" jack-o-lantern.
trick-or-treat12.title: Trick Or Treat 12

description:
Milo has been an absolute smile monster, which is appropriate because Sunday was Halloween. The older boys explored Planet Berkeley as a cosmonaut and a space bug, while Lucie and Felix roamed the savannah as a lion and a giraffe.

Also, see the pictures of Felix's preschool's Halloween Party.
title: October 31
